resources.string: Mask to search (use _ for unknown - eg _a_):
Display a list of French words built from a fixed list of letters and matching a pattern.
Only non accented letters are considered here. For example é and è will both be represented as e.
If a letter is to be repeated in a word, it must be present (at least) that number of times in the list.
The pattern contains the same number of letters as the word, and the special character _ is a replacement for any character.
For example for the list \"letter\", the mask \"_t_\" will give the word \"ete\" (for \"été\") and the mask \"_e_\" will give \"let\", \"ree\" (for \"rée\"), \"tee\", \"tel\", \"ter\" and \"tet\".
The current dictionary only contains French words.
Do you really want to continue?
